item.description:
Hi All,

I have decided on a location.  We are going to have our meetup at the Park Grill and Spirits on 257 Park Ave., Worcester, MA 01609.  The phone number is: 508-756-7995.

There will be a buffet and a cash bar.  The buffet is $20 per person and includes a garden salad and three buffet items: haddock florentine, chicken parm and greek pan pizza.   The tip and tax are included in the $20.

Please, please, only say YES if you are a definite!  It is not fair to me or the restaurant if people are no shows! The deadline to RSVP or change your RSVP is Wednesday!

We will be meeting in the function room upstairs.  I'll create a list of names to check off at the door, and I will be collecting the $20 CASH when each of your arrives.

I look forward to seeing you all on Sunday!

 

Lori
item.how_to_find_us: Location is TBD based on numbers
item.name: Ladies AND Guys! Eat, Drink and Exchange Dating Horrors!
